function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low ventilation rate in office buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission due to insufficient airflow and air exchange","Mitigation":"Increase ventilation rates, use high-efficiency air filters, and implement air purification technologies","Technologies":"High-efficiency air filters, ultraviolet germicidal irradiation, ventilation systems","People":"Office workers, visitors, building occupants","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, HVAC technicians"},{"Description":"Inadequate air filtration in HVAC systems","Impact":"Higher concentration of infectious particles in the air, increasing the risk of COVID-19 transmission","Mitigation":"Upgrade to high-efficiency air filters, use ultraviolet germicidal irradiation, and perform regular maintenance","Technologies":"High-efficiency air filters, ultraviolet germicidal irradiation, air filtration systems","People":"Building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, HVAC technicians"},{"Description":"Use of individual HVAC systems with lower ventilation rates","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission due to lower air exchange rates and higher concentration of infectious particles","Mitigation":"Consider using centralized HVAC systems with higher ventilation rates and air filtration, or upgrade individual systems with better filtration and ventilation","Technologies":"Centralized HVAC systems, high-efficiency air filters, ventilation systems","People":"Office workers, building occupants","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, HVAC technicians"}]}
